arts.ttl: Dorival Junior optimistic of Brazil's progress
arts.sum: Brazil head coach Dorival Junior has said he is cautiously optimistic that his national team is moving in the right direction after their win against Chile.

arts.ttl: Brazil hero Igor Jesus, Argentina's Nico Paz lead list of international debutants
arts.sum: As a new cycle begins, international coaches are looking to reward players who are hitting top form. Here, we take a look at some of the players chosen for the first time.

arts.ttl: Brazil score late for needed WC qualifying win
arts.sum: Lacklustre Brazil pulled off a last-gasp 2-1 away victory over Chile in the South American World Cup qualifiers on Thursday thanks to a goal by substitute Luiz Henrique scored in the 89th minute.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund trigger Yan Couto's £25m obligation to buy just two MONTHS after Brazil international joined on loan from Man City - and he never played for Pep Guardiola's side in four years!
arts.sum: City fought off competition from European heavyweights such as Barcelona and Bayern Munich to lure Couta from Brazilian club Coritiba when he was just 17.

arts.ttl: Argentina arrive in Venezuela after Hurricane Milton scare, as Brazil need upturn in form
arts.sum: With Lionel Messi back after missing the previous two games through injury, Argentina will be hoping to put their defeat to Colombia behind them and get back to winning ways on Thursday when they take on Venezuela away in the ninth game of South American World Cup 2026 qualifying. Venezuela, the only South American team never to have played in a World Cup, is in sixth place with 10 points on its tally, similar to fifth-placed Brazil, which has a better goal difference.

arts.ttl: Man City star Savinho admits he's worried as Brazil face historic World Cup humiliation
arts.sum: Brazil have lost four of their last five World Cup qualifiers and could miss out on automatic qualification for the 2026 tournament unless their results improve

arts.ttl: When is Chile vs Brazil? Times, how to watch on TV, stream online
arts.sum: Five-time World Cup winners, Brazil have failed to impress to date in qualifying: with four defeats to their name in eight games, Dorival Júnior’s men sit in fifth place on ten points. The CONMEBOL World Cup 2026 qualifier between Chile and Brazil will be played on Thursday, October 10, 2024.

arts.ttl: Why isn’t Vinícius Júnior playing for Brazil in the October internationals?
arts.sum: Vinícius isn’t the only Real Madrid player ruled out of the Brazil squad. The 12-hour flight to São Paulo confirmed what Madrid had already reported, that the defender was experiencing discomfort in his left thigh and will need time to rest the injury.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid suffer further injury blow as Brazil star suffers muscular problem
arts.sum: Real Madrid reveal that Eder Militao is facing a spell on the sidelines with the muscular problem that he aggravated against Villarreal.

arts.ttl: Liverpool keeper Alisson out for six weeks
arts.sum: Liverpool have confirmed they will be without first-choice goalkeeper Alisson until late November after he injured his hamstring in their 1-0 win over Crystal Palace on Saturday.
